ModMetaData.name: ZPH - Judge Dredd Armory
ModMetaData.author: HIGGS
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]This is a Judge Dredd Armory Mod.[/h1]
[h2]This mod only contains weapons and apparel. No Factions included.[/h2] It is this way since most of the weapons has toggable weapons and the AI doesn't know how to toggle them, making it a terrible unbalanced faction.
[h2]What this mods include:[/2] 7 Apparels: Judge Garb, Chief Justice Garb, Judge Armor, Senior Judge Armor, Judge Helmn, Judge Hunter Helm, Judge Hunter Armor 4 Apparel Accessories: Judge Belt, Judge Hunter Belt (Shield Belts), Judge Gloves, Judge Boots(has a knife attached) 5 Weappns: Lawgiver MKII, SpitCarbine, Arbitrator, Puzzle Gun, Daystick 1 Resource: Ballistic Fiber
Most of these are locked behind [Advanced Fabrication] Research and requires the Fabrication Workbench. These are Spacer tech items other than the Daystick.
[h2]I will not make a CE patch, though if someone makes one. That's good to hear.[/h2]
